short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Now you can view and manage all your saved bookmarks just by a button click.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Currently the extension has following built in features :
1. Displays all your saved bookmarks in a new tab.
2. You can view, search and delete bookmarks.
3. Automatically updates the view when you add or delete a bookmark in chrome.
4. Keeps your default new tab view as it is and only renders on a button click.
5. Responsive design scales well in all screen sizes.

Things coming soon :
1. Ability to sort the bookmarks based on date added.
2. More color options for the bookmarks.
3. Functionality to render the view in different grid style.
4. Ability to switch to night mode.
